actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

official_title: To establish the Buffalo Bayou National Heritage Area in the State of Texas, and for other purposes.
short_title: Buffalo Bayou National Heritage Area Act

summary.text:
Buffalo Bayou National Heritage Area Act

 This bill establishes the Buffalo Bayou National Heritage Area in Texas. The Buffalo Bayou National Heritage Area Corporation is designated as the management entity for the heritage area. The corporation shall submit a management plan for the heritage area. The bill sets forth requirements for the approval or disapproval of the plan.

The bill specifies its effect on private property protections and water rights with regard to the heritage area. Nothing in this bill is meant to modify the Rio Grande Natural Area Act.
